alertRule.description: Deprecated: AlertRule will be replaced by AlertRules field, is expected to delete 0.5.0 version

level.description: 0 m 1 s 2 h 3 d 4 w 5 y

unit.description: 0 m 1 s 2 h 3 d 4 w 5 y

viewDDLs.description: v2 field to support multiple alarm conditions

cond.description: 0 above 1 below 2 outside range 3 within range

mode.description: 0 m 1 s 2 h 3 d 4 w 5 y

typ.description: 0 default 1 INNER 2 LEFT OUTER 3 RIGHT OUTER 4 FULL OUTER 5 CROSS

hashTyp.description: hash type, 0 no hash 1 sipHash64 2 URLHash

createType.description: operation type, 0 means create clickvisual fresh table, 1 means use exists table

timeFieldType.description: custom time filed type name of _time_

format.description: timestamp parse to extract time from raw log and parse it to datetime

key.description: field name of time in raw log

status.description: 0 无状态 1 待执行 2 执行中 3 执行异常 4 执行完成
0 means Well-Running, others mean not running

configPrometheusOperator.description:
ConfigPrometheusOperator Yaml 格式 e.g.

metadata:

labels:

prometheus: example

role: alert-rules

name: prometheus-example-rules-2

namespace: default

ruleStoreType.description: ruleStoreType 1 文件 2 configmap 3 prometheus operator

configPrometheusOperator.description:
ConfigPrometheusOperator Yaml 格式 e.g.

metadata:

labels:

prometheus: example

role: alert-rules

name: prometheus-example-rules-2

namespace: default

ruleStoreType.description: ruleStoreType 1 文件 2 configmap 3 prometheus operator

cond.description: 0 above 1 below 2 outside range 3 within range

unit.description: 0 m 1 s 2 h 3 d 4 w 5 y

typ.description: 0 default 1 INNER 2 LEFT OUTER 3 RIGHT OUTER 4 FULL OUTER 5 CROSS

format.description: 格式后缀名(比如: toml, yaml)

retryInterval.description: retryInterval: the unit is in seconds, 100 means 100s

acts.description: require(or want) actions. i.e. the key of PermittedActMap

domainId.description: envId or entId based on DomainType respectively

domainType.description: env or ent. i.e. the keys of PermittedDomPrefixMap

objectIdx.description: referId(e.g. aid) or other NameStr(e.g. configResourceName, url etc.)

objectType.description: the type of ObjectIdx. its value must be a valid PermittedPrefix

subResource.description: the subResource of target Object(Type+Idx). If target Obj has no subResource, please set it to "*"

retryInterval.description: retryInterval: the unit is in seconds, 100 means 100s
